mean_en: a speech, etc. at the end of a play, book, or film/movie that comments on or acts as a conclusion to what has happened
sentence: The epilogue really helped to answer some questions I had about the book.
sentence_trans: 这本书的尾声帮助我理解了关于这本书的一些疑问。
word_etyma: epi在…上，在…周围，在…后面 + logue说 → 在后面说的话 → epilogue后记
